both.passingOptionsHTMLDescription: You can also pass options use HTML at the same time by using [html:i18next]

directive.passingOptionsDescription: pass options in directive by using [i18next]
directive.getTranslationKeyFromScope: Get the string, we want to translate, from the $scope

attr.titleAndContent: title should be '$t(hello)' and the content should be '$t(content)'.
attr.titleAndHTML: title should be '$t(hello)' and the content should be '$t(contentHTML)'.

directive.translateVariableThatChanges: Translate a variable which changes after a while.

cloak.heading: i18next Cloak
cloak.description: If the translation files aren't loaded, yet, the translation keys will be used first. Please read the source code of `directive.js` and of this HTML file to see how to avoid that.
